info.name: New Driver APIs
info.description: Collection for newly created driver stats and profile endpoints

request.description:
Get daily statistics for the authenticated driver

Query Parameters:
- date (optional): Date in YYYY-MM-DD format (defaults to today)

Get weekly statistics (Monday-Sunday) for the authenticated driver

Query Parameters:
- date (optional): Date in YYYY-MM-DD format (defaults to today)

Response includes:
- week_start: Monday date
- week_end: Sunday date
- total_rides: Number of rides
- total_earnings: Total fare amount
- total_duration: Total ride duration
- avg_fare: Average fare per ride

Get monthly statistics for the authenticated driver

Query Parameters:
- date (optional): Date in YYYY-MM-DD format (defaults to today)

Response includes:
- month: First day of month
- total_rides: Number of rides
- total_earnings: Total fare amount
- total_duration: Total ride duration
- avg_fare: Average fare per ride

Get driver profile information with embedded statistics

Response includes:
- id: Driver ID
- name: Driver name
- phone_number: Phone number
- license_number: License number
- vehicle_number: Vehicle number
- is_active: Account status
- is_available: Current availability
- created_at: Account creation date
- last_login: Last login timestamp
- stats: Object containing:
  - total_rides: Total rides completed
  - completed_rides: Successfully completed rides
  - total_earnings: Total earnings
  - avg_fare: Average fare per ride

Login to get driver JWT token for authenticated requests

Required body:
- phone_number: Driver's phone number
- password: Driver's password

Response includes JWT token to use in Authorization header
